trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento ocorre apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>propriedade está definida ou o respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento é útil quando pretende determinar o erro para uma célula, consoante o respetivo valor ou estado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>eventos e especifique o texto de erro no processador, uma imagem de erro é apresentado na célula, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como `false` ou célula está no modo de edição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador move o ponteiro do rato sobre o glifo de erro, o texto de erro é apresentado numa descrição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>eventos também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é obtida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>propriedade para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma célula e utilize estas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é inicializada com o valor da célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>propriedade, o que substitui o valor de evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>evento quando trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades de desempenho de definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A>valor para várias células.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [melhores práticas para o dimensionamento do controlo Windows Forms para DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is displayed when the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a mensagem que é apresentada quando a célula está selecionada.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade inicialmente contém o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade se tiver sido definida para uma linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorText property value displays as a ToolTip for the error glyph in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Apresenta o valor da propriedade ErrorText como uma descrição para o glifo erro na célula.
